text: Lion, the King of the Jungle, may move to a different planet.
Secondly, if Dragons came back, some people may try to ride a Dragon, that may not end up well.
Thirdly, if Dragons came back, Eagle,  the King of the Sky, may try to eat more in order to grow in size.
Dragons may become instant celebrities,  they may start acting in movies.
Fifthly, if Dragons came back, other animals  might get jealous, even they may start going to fire-spitting classes.
Other ancient creatures may also come  back, this may result in a huge war.
